code: import axiosClient from'./axiosClient';const CartAPI={getCarts:query=>{const url="/carts".concat(query);return axiosClient.get(url);},postAddToCart:query=>{const url="/carts/add".concat(query);return axiosClient.post(url);},deleteToCart:query=>{const url="/carts/delete".concat(query);return axiosClient.delete(url);},putToCart:query=>{const url="/carts/update".concat(query);return axiosClient.put(url);}};export default CartAPI;
